game.name: Devastablance. Mountain Brotherhood
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A dynamic sci-fi adventure, the events of which unfold in a post-apocalypse setting, the catalyst of which is a terrifying nuclear war.
